Du, a major telecommunications provider in the UAE, offers employees a range of benefits, including wellness programs, flexible work arrangements, educational assistance for children, discounts, and various leave options. Specific benefits include an in-house medical clinic, gym, sports clubs, wellness challenges, and discounts negotiated locally. They also provide free data within the UAE, an additional data SIM, and support for children's education.

Here's a more detailed look at the benefits:


Wellness:


• undefined: Du offers an in-house medical clinic, a well-equipped gym, and various sports clubs.
• undefined: They also organize wellness and fitness challenges for employees.
• undefined: Additional wellness initiatives include an on-site nutritionist and physiotherapist, a diabetes screening and follow-up program, and the "Mamahood" telemedicine app.


Financial:


• undefined: Employees receive discounts through the ESAAD and Fazza cards, and other locally negotiated discounts.
• undefined: They also benefit from an end-of-service gratuity, which is a standard benefit in the UAE, and potentially participation in the UAE pension system.


Work-Life Balance:


• undefined: Du offers flexible working hours.
• undefined: Employees receive 30 days of annual leave, as well as sick leave and maternity/paternity leave.
• undefined: The company also provides support for children's education.


Other Benefits:


• undefined: Du provides free data for employees while in the UAE, plus an additional data SIM.
• undefined: They also offer carrier services for businesses and satellite up/downlink services.
• undefined: Employee reviews highlight good people, a flexible environment, a strong network, and ambitious future plans.
